bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition brought forth by immoderate eating and drinking, as well as depletion weakness of the spleen and stomach, with a feeling of heavy limbs and a desire to sleep, especially after meals. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 4: 治飽食便臥，得穀勞病，令人四 肢煩重，嘿嘿欲臥，食畢輒甚方 , “Recipe to cure food exhaustion disease brought forth by eating to fullness followed by immediate rest. It makes a person have an uncomfortable feeling of heaviness of his four limbs. [Patients] are quiet and wish to lie down”.
